pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## An example:``` pythonfrom rubiran import rubirankey = ""auth = ""bot = rubiran(auth,key)gap = "guids"bot.sendMessage(gap,"rubiran")```###how to install library```bashpip install aiohttppip install pycryptodomepip install pillow```### How to import the Rubik's library``` bashfrom rubiran import rubiran```### How to install the library``` bashpip install rubiran==2.1.0```### My ID in Rubika``` bash@professor_102```## And My ID Channel in Rubika``` bash@python_java_source ```
